title: Ep. 223: Patrick Starrr Believes in Beauty for Everyone
itunes:title: Ep. 223: Patrick Starrr Believes in Beauty for Everyone
itunes:subtitle: Beauty influencer Patrick Starrr returns to Fat Mascara to tell us about One/Size, his gender-inclusive makeup line for “the unseen and unheard.” He also talks about how he deals with imposter syndrome, the business advice he received from beauty entre...
description:
Beauty influencer Patrick Starrr returns to Fat Mascara to tell us about One/Size, his gender-inclusive makeup line for “the unseen and unheard.” He also talks about how he deals with imposter syndrome, the business advice he received from beauty entrepreneurs like Pat McGrath and Vicky Tsai, his dream beauty collaboration, and his perspective on, what he dubs, “the influencer species.” -- Want more of our beauty podcast? Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
